short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autofill job application with your CTgoodjobs profile details in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CT Autofill, the ultimate time-saving tool for job seekers. CT Autofill is a powerful feature designed to streamline the job application process by automatically populating your personal information. With just one click, you can say goodbye to the tedious task of manually filling out application forms.

Time-Saving Convenience: CT Autofill eliminates the need to repeatedly enter your personal information when applying for jobs. By securely storing your details, such as contact information, work experience, and education, CT Autofill effortlessly populates the application forms, saving you valuable time and effort.

Seamless Integration with CTgoodjobs: CT Autofill seamlessly integrates with your CTgoodjobs profile. Once you've filled in your information on CTgoodjobs, you can enjoy the convenience of having that information automatically transferred to the application forms of your chosen job listings. This ensures accuracy and consistency across all your applications.

Compatible with ATS Systems: CT Autofill is compatible with a wide range of Applicant Tracking System (ATS) platforms. These systems are widely used by employers to manage job applications. With CT Autofill, you can confidently apply to jobs through ATS systems that support this feature, knowing that your information will be automatically filled in, saving you time and reducing the chances of errors.

With CT Autofill, you can focus on crafting compelling cover letters and tailoring your resume while leaving the repetitive task of filling out personal information to this intelligent tool. Take advantage of this time-saving feature and gain a competitive edge in your job search journey.
